item.title: Chico add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Chico add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Chico add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Chico add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Chico add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Chico add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Chico add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Chico add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Chico add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt
item.description: "Don't waste the pretty" -- Greg Behrendt

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt
item.description: "Alone also means available for someone outstanding." -- Greg Behrendt

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt
item.description: "Because here’s what guys don’t do if they can’t live without you: They don’t break up with you." -- Greg Behrendt

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt
item.description: "Always be classy. Never be crazy." -- Greg Behrendt

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt
item.description: "If a man is really into you, nothing will stop him from being with you - including a fear of intimacy." -- Greg Behrendt

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt
item.description: "Why should you feel honored for getting scraps of his time?" -- Greg Behrendt

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt, Liz Tuccillo
item.description: "A friend of mine told a story about a date with a guy she was really excited about: He stood her up. He then called her, begging her forgiveness and giving some excuse. She told him to get lost, telling him that he only gets one shot with her, and he blew it." -- Greg Behrendt, Liz Tuccillo

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt
item.description: "The only reason he can miss you is because he’s choosing, every day, not to be with you." -- Greg Behrendt

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt
item.description: "Being brokenhearted is like having broken ribs. On the outside it looks like nothing's wrong, but every breath hurts." -- Greg Behrendt

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt
item.description: "Breakups hurt like a motherf*#ker, but they are not the end of the world. The pain is temporary, and if handled properly, they can even be life-changing." -- Greg Behrendt

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt
item.description: "It is in that moment, when you really lay down your cards and see the relationship for what it was, that you'll find the freedom to kick it in the ass and let it go." -- Greg Behrendt

item.title: Chico add a quote by Greg Behrendt, Liz Tuccillo
item.description: "The word “busy” is the relationship Weapon of Mass Destruction. It seems like a good excuse, but in fact, in every silo you uncover, all you’re going to find is a man who didn’t care enough to call. Remember: Men are never too busy to get what they want." -- Greg Behrendt, Liz Tuccillo

item.title: Chico add a quote by Rae Carson
item.description: "His Majesty, may he live forever and prosper greatly... His Majesty, may sun finches warble sweet melodies in his ear... His Majesty, may orchids bloom in the wake of his passing... His Majesty, may minstrels compose epics at the sound of his glorious name... His Majesty, may his magnificent sword shatter the breasts of his enemies..." -- Rae Carson
